page.title: 20Sandridge School Survey.
page.content:
When we went to Sandridge school we gave the children a questionnaire. Nearly all the children's fathers work out of Sandridge;mostly in London.Most of the children like living in Sandridge,but a lot of the parents think it will become part of St.Albans The majority of the children live in a semi_detached house,and have one car. The mothers only shop at Darby's if they need any small things.Most of them go to St.Albans to do their main shopping.
3rd and 4th year Juniors, Prae Wood J.M.I. School, King Harry Lane, St.Albans, Herts.
